price: 33. Dan telah Kami berikan kepada mereka di antara tanda-tanda (kebesaran Kami) sesuatu yang di dalamnya terdapat nikmat yang nyata.*(796)
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَٰٓؤٞاْ مُّبِينٌ
footnotes: *796). Seperti naungan awan, turunnya mann dan salwa; terpancarnya air dan batu, dan terbelahnya laut Merah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhum mina al-āyāti mā fīhi balāon mubīnun
